Articles.Content:
I see one of the new features of the recent update is a supposed place for people to upload missions to a central hub so we don't need to worry about where to put "community" made mission files one 
would download from another link.

If I go to "play missions" I do in fact see a "community created" tab.   However, there's nothing there.   Is it just that no one has uploaded one there?    Or am I looking in the wrong place?

Thanks in advance for any help.

"Community Created" is for stuff you downloaded (ie, not created by Squad ad put in the game already). If you use Steam, you get them from the Steam Workshop by simply subscribing to them. If you use KerbalX, get them from there and follow the instructions for how to install them (basically put them in the appropriate folder).

Thanks.   I see how the Workshop missions work now.   I just thought that the latest update was going to "migrate" all the stuff out there to avoid having to figure out the install folder destinations.

Guess I was thinking too much.
